CP-AC (Carboplatin, Paclitaxel → Doxorub.name: CP-AC Regimen with Growth Factor
CP-AC (Carboplatin, Paclitaxel → Doxorub.description: Carboplatin and Paclitaxel weekly for 12 weeks, followed by Doxorubicin and Cyclophosphamide every 2 or 3 weeks for 4 cycles, with pegfilgrastim support during AC portion
